view

Class WindowSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.WindowSettings

  • public abstract class WindowSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class to easily configure window's settings like width, height and texture file path. Also handles the graphical initialization.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alexandre Rio
